title: WORLD FLIPPER
introductionText: WORLD FLIPPER is a game for smartphones co-produced by Cygames, Inc. and Citeil, Inc.
detail: An animation production method using the Animation Tool's plug-in functionality has been introduced. The plug-in function enables direct manipulation of the Animation Tool via JavaScript, making it possible to command, streamline, and automate timeline and layer manipulation. The created animations were exported as original JSON and image data via the plug-in function so that they can be read by iOS/Android.
